Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393550) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393550)
